io.proximax.download

Class DirectDownloadParameterBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.download.DirectDownloadParameterBuilder

  • public class DirectDownloadParameterBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This builder class creates the DirectDownloadParameter
    See Also:
    DirectDownloadParameter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DirectDownloadParameter build()
      Builds the DirectDownloadParameter
      Defaults the following if not provided privacyStrategy - to plain privacy strategy
      static DirectDownloadParameterBuilder createFromDataHash(java.lang.String dataHash, java.lang.String digest)
      Construct the builder class with data hash and digest

      Construct the builder class with transaction hash, account private key and validate digest flag
      DirectDownloadParameterBuilder withNemKeysPrivacy(java.lang.String privateKey, java.lang.String publicKey)
      Set the privacy strategy as secured with nem keys

      Privacy strategy defines how the data will be decrypted
      DirectDownloadParameterBuilder withPasswordPrivacy(java.lang.String password)
      Set the privacy strategy as secured with password

      Privacy strategy defines how the data will be decrypted

    • Method Detail

      • createFromTransactionHash

        public static DirectDownloadParameterBuilder createFromTransactionHash(java.lang.String transactionHash,
                                                                       java.lang.String accountPrivateKey,
                                                                       java.lang.Boolean validateDigest)
        Construct the builder class with transaction hash, account private key and validate digest flag
        Parameters:
        transactionHash - the transaction hash of target download
        accountPrivateKey - the private key of the sender or recipient of the transaction (required when downloading from secure message)
        validateDigest - the validate digest flag as to whether to verify data with digest
        Returns:
        the direct download parameter builder

      • createFromDataHash

        public static DirectDownloadParameterBuilder createFromDataHash(java.lang.String dataHash,
                                                                java.lang.String digest)
        Construct the builder class with data hash and digest
        Parameters:
        dataHash - the data hash to download
        digest - the digest to verify download
        Returns:
        the download data parameter builder

      • withPrivacyStrategy

        public DirectDownloadParameterBuilder withPrivacyStrategy(PrivacyStrategy privacyStrategy)
        Set the privacy strategy to decrypt the data

        Privacy strategy defines how the data will be decrypted
        Parameters:
        privacyStrategy - the privacy strategy
        Returns:
        the same instance of this builder

      • withPlainPrivacy

        public DirectDownloadParameterBuilder withPlainPrivacy()
        Set the privacy strategy as plain

        Privacy strategy defines how the data will be decrypted
        Returns:
        the same instance of this builder

      • withNemKeysPrivacy

        public DirectDownloadParameterBuilder withNemKeysPrivacy(java.lang.String privateKey,
                                                         java.lang.String publicKey)
        Set the privacy strategy as secured with nem keys

        Privacy strategy defines how the data will be decrypted
        Parameters:
        privateKey - the private key of one blockchain account that encrypted the data
        publicKey - the public key of the other blockchain account that encrypted the data
        Returns:
        the same instance of this builder

      • withPasswordPrivacy

        public DirectDownloadParameterBuilder withPasswordPrivacy(java.lang.String password)
        Set the privacy strategy as secured with password

        Privacy strategy defines how the data will be decrypted
        Parameters:
        password - a 50-character minimum password
        Returns:
        the same instance of this builder

      • build

        public DirectDownloadParameter build()
        Builds the DirectDownloadParameter
        Defaults the following if not provided
        • privacyStrategy - to plain privacy strategy
        Returns:
        the download data parameter
